text: The Korean Wikipedia is the Korean-language edition of Wikipedia. This edition was started in October 2002, and as of June 2020 15, has over 500,000 articles.:ko:특수:통계 It is the 27th largest edition.Wikimedia list of Wikipedias and their statistics.. Retrieved 25 October 2015. == References == == Other websites == * Korean Wikipedia main page. Category:Wikipedias
title: Korean Wikipedia
